nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Face Off is a LEGO Star Wars title featuring fictional a total of twenty-nine fictional "face off" matchups between various Star Wars characters. The 64-page title, written by Arie Kaplan and illustrated by Dave White, was released by Scholastic on August 30, 2016.

This book pits LEGO(R) STAR WARS villains against heroes, comparing their gear, stats, weapons, and imaging [sic] showdowns that they've never seen before! From Luke and Leia to Star Wars Rebels, the whole gang is here! How would Hoth Luke stack up against tropical Darth Maul? Could Chewbacca defeat three jawas if they stacked on top of each other? You decide!
